From https://pakillo.github.io/R-GIS-tutorial/:

To use google maps we need to enable a APIs (Maps Embed API and Maps Static API) and add a API key:


```{r}
library(dismo)
gmKey <- readLines(sprintf("%s/.secrets/googlecloud/maps-api",Sys.getenv("HOME")))

x <- runif(30)*10 + 40
y <- runif(30)*10 - 20
xy <- cbind(x, y)
g <- gmap(xy, type='hybrid', map_key=gmKey)
plot(g)
points(Mercator(xy) , col='red', pch=20)
```


```{r}
library(googleVis)
data(Exports)    # a simple data frame
Geo <- gvisGeoChart(Exports, locationvar="Country", sizevar="Profit", 
                  options=list(height=400, dataMode='regions'))
plot(Geo)


data(Andrew)
M1 <- gvisMap(Andrew, "LatLong", "Tip", 
              options=list(showTip=TRUE, showLine=F, enableScrollWheel=TRUE, 
                           mapType='satellite', useMapTypeControl=TRUE, width=800,height=400))
plot(M1)


```
